versos: (obey) Hebrews 13:17 - "Have confidence in your leaders and submit to their authority, because they keep watch over you as those who must give an account. Do this so that their work will be a joy, not a burden, for that would be of no benefit to you.";;;
(kids) Proverbs 10:1: "A wise son brings joy to his father, but a foolish son brings grief to his mother.";;;

(loveth) John 14:21 - "He that hath my commandments, and keepeth them, he it is that loveth me: and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father, and I will love him, and will manifest myself to him.";;;
(smooth) "smooth words may hide a wicked heart, just as a pretty glaze covers a clay pot." - Proverbs 26:23;;;
(neck) Proverbs 29:1 - "He who is often reproved, yet stiffens his neck, will suddenly be broken beyond healing.";;;
(sit) Psalm 110:1 - "The Lord says to my Lord: 'sit at my right hand until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet.'";;;
(kiss) Song of Solomon 1:2 - Let him kiss me with the kisses of his mouth for your love is more delightful than wine.;;;
(kissed) Luke 7:45 - "You did not give me a kiss, but this woman, from the time I entered, has not stopped kissing my feet.";;;
(elah) Ezra 4:1 - Now when the adversaries of Judah and Benjamin heard that the descendants of the captivity were building the temple of the Lord God of Israel elah
(smell) 2 Corinthians 2:15 - "For we are the aroma of Christ to God among those who are being saved and among those who are perishing.";;;
(canaan) Joshua 6:12 - "Joshua got up early the next morning, and the priests took up the ark of the Lord.";;;
(plenty) "Then your barns will be filled to overflowing, and your vats will brim over with new wine." - Proverbs 3:10 NIV;;;
(corn) Jeremiah 41:8 - But ten men were found among them that said unto Ishmael
(blesseth) Philippians 4:19 - "But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.";;;
(trembled) Matthew 28:4 - "The guards were so afraid of him that they shook and became like dead men.";;;
(cried) Psalm 34:6 - "This poor man cried, and the Lord heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.";;;
(bitter) Hebrews 12:15: "See to it that no one falls short of the grace of God and that no bitter root grows up to cause trouble and defile many.";;;
(subtilty) Genesis 3:1 - "Now the serpent was more subtil than any beast of the field which the Lord God had made.";;;
